name.$: BRISTOL-MYERS SQUIBB HOLDINGS IRELAND UNLIMITED COMPANY

p.$: Compositions comprising crystalline apixaban particles having a D equal to or less than 89 &mu;m, and a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier, are substantially bioequivalent and can be used to for the treatment and/or prophylaxis of thromboembolic disorders.
